original_text: And on the eighth day he shall bring them for his cleansing to the priest, to the entrance of the tent of meeting, before the Lord.
korean_text: 여덟째 날에 그 결례를 위하여 그것들을 회막 문 여호와 앞 제사장에게로 가져갈 것이요

sentences.original_text: he shall bring them for his cleansing to the priest
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 자신의 정결을 위해 그것들을 제사장에게 가져올 것입니다

sentences.original_text: to the entrance of the tent of meeting
